name: Eternity Battle
description:
A game i have been making alone as a conclusion project for my college.

You can play with your friends or alone using a basic Ai system in the game.

You can play using Mouse and Keyboard or Joystick/Gamepad.

Move with WASD aim with the mouse and cast your abilities with Q,E,R,F.

Thank you for playing the game, any feedback is always welcome.

The music used in the game is a modified version of a music made by the user:  djgriffin . 

Avaliable on: 

https://freesound.org/people/djgriffin/sounds/172561/?page=1#comment
